CHAT.comment: CHI and MIT are in the living room .
CHI and MIT are back at the table

u.a: shows CHI a card with a picture of an icecream
brings the picture card box to MIT and points at the inside of the box
puts the icecream card in the box
shows CHI a card with a picture of a lemon
gives more picture cards to MIT
shows CHI the lemon card again
picks up a card with a picture of a monkey
gives the monkey card to MIT
shows CHI a card with the sun
takes a book on the sofa and shows it to MIT
picks up a Toys R Us catalog
lies down next to a vinyl coloring sheet featuring characters from the Flintstones
takes off the wrapping and breaks the crayon in half
gives one half of the crayon to CHI
shows CHI a couple of other crayons
the crayons don't work well on the sheet because the vinyl surface is too smooth
colors the drawing next to the one CHI is working
grabs a drawing on the floor
points at a drawing of Baikinman
takes another drawing and shows it to MIT
points at a drawing of Anpanman
takes another sheet of paper and taps at the drawing of a tiger
points at a drawing of Baby Bop
gives another sheet of paper to MIT pointing at one of the drawings on it
gives MIT another sheet of paper
there isn't enough space on the paper to draw a picture of Baikinman
points at MIT's drawing of Baikin man
starts drawing Baikin man on a different sheet of paper
the carpetted floor is too soft to draw on
points at the crayon CHI is using
takes a yellow crayon and starts coloring his Baikin man with it
gives the yellow crayon to MIT
colors the drawing with the red crayon
takes the yellow crayon again and starts coloring
draws two horns on the circle
puts his pointing fingers on his head to make two horns
puts his finger on his head like MIT
moves his upper body to the tune with MIT
moves his upper body with MIT
makes horns with his finger again
waives his hand over CHI's head
scribbles on his drawing of Baikinman
looking at the posters on the wall
takes the paper and points at Anpanman
takes back the paper and draws more
goes to the table where the pattern matching toy is
shows MIT where to sit by pointing at a chair next to his
takes out the patterns from the frames
pushes out a pattern from the frame
the piece pops out of the frame and makes big noise
points at another set of patterns and frames
takes out another panel of patterns and frames
puts the panel of the table
opens a drawer of the table
there were many drawings in the drawer before, but CHI has taken out all of them while playing with DEE, and now there's none left
takes a picture book (Arthur Goes to School)
sits on a chair with MIT
points at a character in the book
opens a flap with the number 5
there are five teddy bears under the flap
they see a cat in a tree
there is a book inside the bag
<aft> they see a toy rocket and a drum
<aft> a young girl is inside the car
points at another dog on the page
there is a girl in the car .
flips the page and lifts the flap with the number 5
turns the page and opens a flap of a bird cage
<aft> they see the bird flying out
<aft> there is a small book underneath
lifts a flap with the letter H
touches a flap with the letter F
opens a flap with the letter E
moves his hands like a leaping frog
holds up his arms as if carrying an umbrella
rocks his upper body to the tune
moves his upper body with MIT
<aft> loses his balance on the chair
tries to split the back cover to find more pages
pats the back cover to show that they are no more pages
opens the book to a page they skipped
opens a flap that shows a tower made of building blocks
points at a flap that shows a short plant
<aft> the plant is now tall and has a flower
there are pieces from the pattern matching toy, a mug, and the tape recorder in the direction
points at the pattern matching pieces
they have heard the washing machine beeping
takes the mug from CHI and shows him the remaining juice
<aft> MIT and CHI go into the kitchen to get more juice
holds up a train pattern from the matching toy
runs the train around on the table
moves the car around on the table
stops drinking and takes the helicopter
moves the ship on the table
moves the sailboat over the table
takes out a book from the cabinet
The book shows different stores and their merchandise and the reader is supposed to match the item with the store
CHI drops his mug on the floor
takes the mug and puts it on the far end of the table
takes out another book from the cabinet
this book has several buttons that plays sounds of a car, a spaceship, a train and a boat
takes a train piece from the matching toy and shows it to CHI
moves his arms like driving rods
moves his arms like driving rods
looks around and looks for a truck piece from the matching toy
picks a car piece and holds it out
picks up the truck and gives it to CHI
holds the truck and the train and moves them around
points at a picture of a car
points at a picture of a plane
takes the helicopter from CHI and turns it
shakes his head as if he feels the vibration of the helicopter
leaves his chair and gets the mug
takes out a Barney book from the cabinet
opens the book and shows it to CHI
looks at the cat on the first page
wipes CHI's hand with tissue paper
points at the juice on the table
wipes the juice on the table
shows the juice on the truck piece
wipes the juice on the truck
there is a gorilla licking food
CHI has the magnet piece that shows the face of the animal
puts the magnet piece on the page
takes out a stuffed Barney from the cabinet
<aft> Barney says: Hello again to all my friends
<aft> Barney says: Let's make it look like a fire engine, rrrr
brings another book from the cabinet
points at a picture of the moon in the book
points at a picture of a train
points at a picture of a butterfly
flaps his arms like a butterfly
